abstract: Costume designer Wendy Chuck explains how interviews with news folk helped her capture dressed-down fashion style of journalists for movie Spotlight, film about Boston Globe’s 2002 breaking-news coverage of Roman Catholic Church sexual abuse scandal.
lead_paragraph: The costume designer of “Spotlight” calls the journalist look “an unthought-about uniform.” It says, “You don’t really care, you’ve got other things to think about.” So there.

headline.main: In ‘Spotlight,’ the Artless Look of the Boston Journalist
headline.print_headline: ‘Spotlight’ Costume Designer on What Makes Newsroom Chic
